Name: Lightning Blast
Description: Enters the Core Passive state after pinging any Blue Orb.

Name: Heisen
Description: ATK +3%, Lightning DMG +7%. Attacks have a 25% chance to trigger Thunderstorm to Electrocute the enemy, reducing their Lightning Resistance by 8% for 5s. Attacking Electrocuted enemies has a 20% chance to deal 250% Lightning DMG.

Name: Darwin
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% for 4s for each Orb pinged, stacking up to 5 times. When Signal Orbs are pinged, their colors will be marked. Once all 3 colors have been marked, unleashes a shockwave that deals 600% Physical DMG and resets the marks.

Name: Condelina
Description: Basic Attacks deal 15% more damage, and have a 25% chance to go berserk, increasing the Extra DMG Bonus of Basic Attack by 15% and CRIT Rate by 5% for 5s.

Name: Arbalest
Description: Each time the Core Passive status is triggered, only one attack can be launched but deals +200% DMG.

Name: Electro Charge
Description: After entering battle, the characters no longer get Red Orbs. Red Orbs are replaced by an equal number of Blue Orbs.

Name: Volley
Description: The effect of "Arbalest" is enhanced: Attacks made in Sniping Form will shoot 2 additional arrows. The damage of each arrow is calculated individually.

Name: Sudden Rain
Description: Recovery speed of Signal Orbs by Basic Attack +100%.

Name: Annihilation
Description: When Blue Orbs are pinged: Pulls in all enemies within a large area to the front of the character and summons a lightning strike that damages them for 20% of max HP, or 10% of current HP if the target is a Boss. 30s cooldown.

Name: Signal Amplifier
Description: Attack +5% permanently for every Signal Orb pinged, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Lightning Rebuke
Description: Casts a Signature Move of even larger range at the starting location and leaves behind a Lightning Field that lasts 7s.

Name: Heisen
Description: ATK +3%, Lightning DMG +7%. Attacks have a 25% chance to trigger Thunderstorm to Electrocute the enemy, reducing their Lightning Resistance by 8% for 5s. Attacking Electrocuted enemies has a 20% chance to deal 250% Lightning DMG.

Name: Darwin
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% for 4s for each Orb pinged, stacking up to 5 times. When Signal Orbs are pinged, their colors will be marked. Once all 3 colors have been marked, unleashes a shockwave that deals 600% Physical DMG and resets the marks.

Name: Condelina
Description: Basic Attacks deal 15% more damage, and have a 25% chance to go berserk, increasing the Extra DMG Bonus of Basic Attack by 15% and CRIT Rate by 5% for 5s.

Name: Lightning Control
Description: Within the Lightning Field, allies gain +100% Dodge Recovery and 30% Extra DMG Reduction.

Name: Attack Order
Description: All members get +50% Extra DMG Bonus for 10s when switched into battle. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Thunder Fury
Description: Allies gain Super Armor and +20% Extra DMG Bonus within the Lightning Field.

Name: Signal Charge
Description: All members gain 3 Signal Orbs of a random color when switched into battle. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Echo
Description: Lightning Rebuke is also triggered when leaving battle: Casts a Signature Move of even larger range at the leaving location and leaves behind a Lightning Field that lasts 7s.

Name: Signal Amplifier
Description: Attack +5% permanently for every Signal Orb pinged, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Starry Sky
Description: The final DMG caused by Shooting Star Orb +50%.

Name: Seraphine
Description: ATK +5%, Dark DMG +5%. Base DMG of Reprise +100%. Ally units healed by Capriccio gain +10% Dark DMG for 8s.

Name: Kuriko
Description: Pings grant 20% more Energy. The Signature Move consumes 20% less Energy. Upon casting the Signature Move, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15% for 10s. Meanwhile, gains Super Armor and 20% Extra DMG Reduction for 5s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Einsteina
Description: QTE and 3-Pings decrease the related Stats Resistance of the target by 15% for 8s, 10s Cooldown. When attacked, unfolds stats aura, gaining Stats Resistance and increasing the Stats DMG dealt by 15% for 5s, 8s Cooldown.

Name: Nebula
Description: Hitting an enemy with Shooting Star Orb will increase the damage of Reprise: Twin Stars during Signature by 50%.

Name: Realm of Capriccio
Description: While Signature is active, the Extra DMG Reduction within Realm of Capriccio increases to 80% and will last 5s more after the realm disappears.

Name: Charged Shooting Star
Description: Gains bonus 4 Signature Energy when pinging Shooting Star Orbs.

Name: Restructured Shooting Star
Description: For every Shooting Star Orb pinged, gains a random set of 3-Ping Orbs when casting Reprise: Twin Stars after all Shooting Star Orbs are consumed.

Name: Cosmos Suite
Description: Each time Reprise: Twin Stars is cast, the final damage of Signature +30% permanently, up to +150%.

Name: Health Boost
Description: For every 1% HP left, ATK +1%, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Phantasia
Description: Within 8s after leaving battle: When an ally character casts a 3-Ping, Selena will also cast a 3-Ping Combo Strike of the same color. This effect has a 2s cooldown.

Name: Seraphine
Description: ATK +5%, Dark DMG +5%. Base DMG of Reprise +100%. Ally units healed by Capriccio gain +10% Dark DMG for 8s.

Name: Bathlon
Description: ATK increases by 3%. Dark DMG increases by 7%. Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a Dark Area for 5s. Attacks on targets within the area have a 20% chance to grant 1 Signal Orb and have a 12s cooldown. Meanwhile, reduces Corrupted targets' Dark DMG Resistance by 8%.

Name: Einsteina
Description: QTE and 3-Pings decrease the related Stats Resistance of the target by 15% for 8s, 10s Cooldown. When attacked, unfolds stats aura, gaining Stats Resistance and increasing the Stats DMG dealt by 15% for 5s, 8s Cooldown.

Name: Immortal Song
Description: After Capriccio leaves battle and a Combo Strike is triggered, the character currently in battle will be healed for 50% of Capriccio's ATK and get +30% Extra DMG Bonus for 3s.

Name: Coordination Order
Description: When a member triggers a QTE, activates a QTE of another character. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Encore
Description: When ally character pings orbs, there is a 20% chance to refund the Signal Orbs consumed.

Name: Signature Charge
Description: All members get 50 Signature Energy when switched into battle. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Famed Concertmaster
Description: The effects of "Phantasia"" and ""Immortal Song" are enhanced: Within 15s after Selena leaves battle, when an ally character makes a 3-Ping, Selena will also cast a 3-Ping Combo Strike of the same color. This effect has an 1s cooldown. When a Combo Strike is triggered, the Extra DMG Bonus for the character currently in battle increases to +60%.

Name: Health Boost
Description: For every 1% HP left, ATK +1%, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Strings On Me
Description: Any Ping will immediately grant full Jete Points and restore Energy equal to that of a 3-Ping.

Name: Chen Jiyuan
Description: ATK +3%, Ice DMG +7%. Attacks have a 30% chance to trigger Frost, reducing the enemy's Ice Resistance by 8% and Movement Speed by 20% for 5s. Attacking enemies inflicted with Frost has a 20% chance to deal 420% Ice DMG.

Name: Hanna
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings increases by 25%. For every 30s, enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping and gains 1 random Signal Orb.

Name: Darwin
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% for 4s for each Orb pinged, stacking up to 5 times. When Signal Orbs are pinged, their colors will be marked. Once all 3 colors have been marked, unleashes a shockwave that deals 600% Physical DMG and resets the marks.

Name: Memory Pact
Description: Permanently gains +25% Extra DMG Bonus each time a Signal Orb color is forgotten, up to 225%.

Name: Puppet's Dance
Description: Recovers 20% max HP each time upon entering Matrix.

Name: Forgotten Pact
Description: Gains a set of random Signal Orbs each time a color of Signal Orb is forgotten.

Name: Puppet Theater
Description: Enters Matrix after casting Signature Move.

Name: Law of Sequence
Description: Successfully dodging an enemy attack while Core Passive is active will immediately activate Matrix and reset its cooldown.

Name: Signal Amplifier
Description: Attack +5% permanently for every Signal Orb pinged, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Folded Memory
Description: When switched into battle, forgets a Signal Orb color to gain 60 Signature Energy and a large number of Signal Orbs.

Name: Chen Jiyuan
Description: ATK +3%, Ice DMG +7%. Attacks have a 30% chance to trigger Frost, reducing the enemy's Ice Resistance by 8% and Movement Speed by 20% for 5s. Attacking enemies inflicted with Frost has a 20% chance to deal 420% Ice DMG.

Name: Hanna
Description: Extra DMG Bonus of 3-Pings increases by 25%. For every 30s, enters Matrix upon a 3-Ping and gains a random Signal Orb.

Name: Darwin
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% for 4s for each Orb pinged, stacking up to 5 times. When Signal Orbs are pinged, their colors will be marked. Once all 3 colors have been marked, unleashes a shockwave that deals 600% Physical DMG and resets the marks.

Name: Stage Beats
Description: Pinging Signal Orbs of the same color consecutively will grant +20% Extra DMG Bonus for 10s, up to 200%.

Name: Attack Order
Description: All members get +50% Extra DMG Bonus for 10s when switched into battle. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Frost Threads
Description: The effect of "Folded Memory" is enhanced: When switched into battle, forgets Yellow and Blue Orbs but keeps Red Orbs.

Name: Signal Charge
Description: All members gain 3 Signal Orbs of a random color when switched into battle. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Transform Tracker
Description: Within 4s after switched into battle, immediately gains the same number of Signal Orbs after pinging Signal Orbs.

Name: Signal Amplifier
Description: Attack +5% permanently for every Signal Orb pinged, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.
For every 21 combos landed, gains 2% Extra DMG Bonus permanently, up to 200%.

Name: Bathlon
Description: ATK increases by 3%. Dark DMG increases by 7%. Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a Dark Area for 5s. Attacks on targets within the area have a 20% chance to grant 1 Signal Orb and have a 12s cooldown. Meanwhile, reduces Corrupted targets' Dark DMG Resistance by 8%.

Name: Einsteina
Description: QTE and 3-Pings decrease the related Stats Resistance of the target by 15% for 8s, 10s Cooldown. When attacked, unfolds stats aura, gaining Stats Resistance and increasing the Stats DMG dealt by 15% for 5s, 8s Cooldown.

Name: Darwin
Description: Extra DMG Bonus increases by 3% for 4s for each orb pinged, stacking up to 5 times. When Signal Orbs are pinged, their colors will be marked. Once all 3 colors have been marked, unleashes a shockwave that deals 600% Physical DMG and resets the marks.

Name: Noctis
Description: Summons an additional "Noctis" in battle that acts as the target for No. 21 and Buddy.
For every 210 combos landed, Vera will heal and enhance No. 21, immediately restoring 20% HP and grant +30% Dark DMG Bonus for 8s.
Gains 1 Signal Orb for every 42 combos landed.
For every 2,100 combos landed, Vera will assist No. 21 to instantly eliminate all enemies, or damage the enemy for 40% of max HP if the target is a Boss.

Name: Jubilance
Description: Upon dealing damage, also launches a strike that deals True DMG equal to 50% of the damage dealt. This bonus attack is also counted toward the combo number.

Name: Enhanced Mobility
Description: For every 1% Dodge Gauge left, ATK +1%, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Boom
Description: When switched into battle, Noctis will launch a bombardment that deals 2200% True DMG to enemies within a large area.

Name: Bathlon
Description: ATK increases by 3%. Dark DMG increases by 7%. Attacks have a 20% chance to summon a Dark Area for 5s. Attacks on targets within the area have a 20% chance to grant 1 Signal Orb and have a 12s cooldown. Meanwhile, reduces Corrupted targets' Dark DMG Resistance by 8%.

Description: QTE and 3-Pings decrease the related Stats Resistance of the target by 15% for 8s, 10s Cooldown. When attacked, unfolds stats aura, gaining Stats Resistance and increasing the Stats DMG dealt by 15% for 5s, 8s Cooldown.

Name: Phobia
Description: After bombardment, leaves an area behind for 3s that reduces the Movement Speed of enemies within by 30%.

Name: Defense Order
Description: All members get 30% Extra DMG Reduction for 10s when switched into battle. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Boom "Boom"
Description: The number of bombardments after switching into battle +2.

Name: Shield Charge
Description: All members get a Shield of 20% max HP when switched into battle. When the Shield is active, they also gain Super Armor. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Boom "Boom"" ""Boom"
Description: Each explosion has a 50% chance to increase its damage by 100%. If the damage is successfully increased, this probability will be calculated repeatedly, increasing the Explosion DMG up to 400%. Each explosion is calculated individually.

Name: Enhanced Mobility
Description: For every 1% Dodge Gauge left, ATK +1%, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Divine Judgment
Description: When Ex - Lightning Lure is triggered: Strikes all enemies damaged by Ex - Lightning Lure again for 1700% Lightning DMG.

Name: Heisen
Description: ATK +3%, Lightning DMG +7%. Attacks have a 25% chance to trigger Thunderstorm to Electrocute the enemy, reducing their Lightning Resistance by 8% for 5s. Attacking Electrocuted enemies has a 20% chance to deal 250% Lightning DMG.

Name: Guinevere
Description: Healing effect increases by 10%. Healed target has Elemental DMG and Resistance increased by 10% for 5s. 8s cooldown. Every healing will charge up the drone. Once fully charged, a drone will be summoned at the cost of all charge upon next healing cast. The drone automatically follows the character, recovering 2% of max HP per second and increasing Elemental Attack by 15% for 5s in the area. 12s cooldown.

Name: Kuriko
Description: Pings grant 20% more Energy. The Signature Move consumes 20% less Energy. Upon casting the Signature Move, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15% for 10s. Meanwhile, gains Super Armor and 20% Extra DMG Reduction for 5s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Sanctum
Description: Duration of Yellow Orb increases by 100%.

Name: Virtual Barrier
Description: Duration of Blue Orb increases by 100%.

Name: Lightning Charge
Description: Gains 1 random Signal Orb when triggering Ex - Lightning Lure

Name: Electricity Loop
Description: Gains 1 random Signal Orb after pinging a total of 15 Orbs.

Name: Electricity Surge
Description: Any Ping is regarded as a 3-Ping

Name: Health Boost
Description: For every 1% HP left, ATK +1%, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.

Name: Energization
Description: After Liv heals another character, their Basic Attacks can also inflict the target with Lightning Marks and trigger Lightning Lure.

Name: Heisen
Description: ATK +3%, Lightning DMG +7%. Attacks have a 25% chance to trigger Thunderstorm to Electrocute the enemy, reducing their Lightning Resistance by 8% for 5s. Attacking Electrocuted enemies has a 20% chance to deal 250% Lightning DMG.

Once fully charged, a drone will be summoned at the cost of all charge upon next healing cast. The drone automatically follows the character, recovering 2% of max HP per second and increasing Elemental Attack by 15% for 5s in the area. 12s cooldown.

Name: Kuriko
Description: Pings grant 20% more Energy. The Signature Move consumes 20% less Energy. Upon casting the Signature Move, increases Extra DMG Bonus by 15% for 10s. Meanwhile, gains Super Armor and 20% Extra DMG Reduction for 5s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Domain Control
Description: When any member triggers Lightning Lure, all members gain 30% Extra DMG Bonus for 3s.

Name: Coordination Order
Description: When a member triggers a QTE, activates a QTE of another character. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Oversupply
Description: Restores 10 Signature Energy when Core Passive Lightning Lure is triggered regardless whether Liv is in battle or not.

Name: Signature Charge
Description: All members get 50 Signature Energy when switched into battle. (Effects of the same name can be triggered once only and cannot be stacked.)

Name: Lightning Domain
Description: Casting Lux's QTE will also cast Signature if there is sufficient Energy.

Name: Health Boost
Description: For every 1% HP left, ATK +1%, up to +100%. Extra DMG Reduction +50% permanently.
